author: ituckey
title: Saido Berahino’s failed drugs test and resulting cover-up leaves managers Tony Pulis and Mark Hughes washing their hands of shameful episode
text:
EFL LIES, LIES AND MDMA LIES Saido Berahino’s failed drugs test and resulting cover-up leaves managers Tony Pulis and Mark Hughes washing their hands of shameful episode 
New Stoke striker's ban after MDMA test is a classic example of English football trying to sweep nasty things under carpet Comment
